issue.title: Load PID joint controller parameters from sdf

content.raw:
I can set a tolerance that works well for the robonaut arms, but then if I include the neck it causes vibrations since the effort limits are so large.
~~~
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<sdf version="1.5">
  <world name="default">
    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://r2_description</uri>
      <plugin name="init_joint_control" filename="libJointControlPlugin.so">
        <controller type="position">
          <joint>r2/left_arm/joint.</joint>
          <joint>r2/right_arm/joint.</joint>
          <joint>r2/neck/joint.</joint> <!-- Causes instability -->
          <target>0</target>
          <tolerance>0.1</tolerance>
        </controller>
      </plugin>
    </include>
  </world>
</sdf>
~~~
content.html:
I can set a tolerance that works well for the robonaut arms, but then if I include the neck it causes vibrations since the effort limits are so large.

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<sdf version="1.5">
  <world name="default">
    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://r2_description</uri>
      <plugin name="init_joint_control" filename="libJointControlPlugin.so">
        <controller type="position">
          <joint>r2/left_arm/joint.</joint>
          <joint>r2/right_arm/joint.</joint>
          <joint>r2/neck/joint.</joint> <!-- Causes instability -->
          <target>0</target>
          <tolerance>0.1</tolerance>
        </controller>
      </plugin>
    </include>
  </world>
</sdf>
